law.catch_line: ** IN EFFECT UNTIL OCTOBER 1, 2015 PER CHAPTERS 312 AND 313 OF 2012**...
law.text:
** IN EFFECT UNTIL OCTOBER 1, 2015 PER CHAPTERS 312 AND 313 OF 2012**
be at least 21 years old; and
complete a training program that is approved by the agency that licensed the residential child care program.
